Text: tnx! we need more quality foreign movies :)
This guy made Cinema Paradiso, my favorite movie of all times... so I have to see this! Thanks Scene4all.

This movie was absolutely brilliant.  Although slow paced, you'd be mistaken if you thought this was boring in any way.  It's been a LONG LONG time since a movie has been able to captivate my attention from beginning to end in such a way.  Don't skip a beat.  Watch it from beginning to end.  The mystery just keeps unraveling.
Really worth watching !!! Thank you for sharing & seeding ( to all).
